ygData.subject: The pursuer...
ygData.msgSnippet: The ship s computer warned him that they were nearing the transwarp passage that would bring him into the prehistoric solar system. He came out of his trance

The ship's computer warned him that they were nearing the transwarp
passage that would bring him into the prehistoric solar system. He
came out of his trance and looked around. He was near, and his prey
would be there soon.

???: Computer, calculate after warp waypoint. New coordinates.
Waypoint Alpha; Asteroid belt. Waypoint Beta; 3 billion km away from
Neptune. Waypoint Omega; orbit of Pluto. That's where I'll be on the
lookout.

The computer bleeped an acknowledgement signal.

He went back to his meditation. He had felt that the Dark One's spark
was not his own and that he could try to intervene in it, but it
seemed too risky. The Tripredacus had made him strong, too strong even
for them to resist. He would find him instantly if he went for direct
spark contact.

Another option was to tear his spark out of his chest. He knew his
plasma blades could do this, but it was up to him to decide...
